title: Trucking Logistics Tracker Manager
job_overview:
AJG Transport is seeking a proactive and experienced Remote Operations Manager to oversee and optimize day-to-day logistics coordination within a fully remote environment. This role mirrors the core responsibilities of our operations staff but requires a seasoned professional who is execution-ready, demonstrates strong leadership, and consistently drives team performance and operational efficiency.

The Ideal Candidate
- A natural leader with a proactive mindset, capable of managing a remote team under pressure and solving problems on the spot.
- Strong operational background in logistics, dispatch, or transportation, with a passion for execution and improvement.
- Comfortable leading through Zoom and digital communication platforms throughout the shift, with a sharp eye for both the small details and the bigger picture.

Responsibilities
- Organize and manage digital workspaces to ensure a productive remote environment. Guide associates in optimizing procedures and provide direction on best practices.
- Own the creation and refinement of remote work policies and SOPs. Ensure adoption and compliance across the team to enhance productivity and consistency.
- Oversee the distribution of internal and external communications via Telegram and other platforms, ensuring timely responses and alignment across teams.
- Act as the escalation point for Zoom communications with drivers, customers, and teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to address issues, resolve challenges, and provide leadership in real time.
- Supervise the creation and maintenance of digital records in Excel and Loadstop. Conduct regular audits to ensure data integrity and coach staff on record-keeping standards.
- Monitor and direct route planning using Samsara and Loadstop. Make executive decisions on dispatch adjustments to meet customer deadlines and improve efficiency.
- Ensure timely and accurate updates are delivered to customers. Handle escalations professionally and foster lasting client relationships through transparency and reliability.
- Schedule and lead virtual meetings to align cross-functional efforts, ensuring goals are met and operations remain smooth and efficient.
- Monitor digital tool access and functionality. Collaborate with IT to address shortages and troubleshoot technical issues promptly.
- Generate, review, and distribute performance and delivery reports. Use data to recommend improvements and inform decision-making.
- Respond decisively to remote work disruptions or logistical issues. Act as the go-to problem solver, providing clarity and resolution to staff and stakeholders.
- Collaborate with other department leads to ensure remote operations align with company standards and initiatives.
- Set the tone for strong supplier, customer, and team relationships through consistent, transparent, and respectful communication.

Skills & Qualifications
- 2+ years of managerial experience in logistics, dispatch, or operations required.
- Excellent leadership, organizational, and analytical skills.
- High proficiency in LoadStop, Samsara, Zoom, Excel, and remote team tools.
- Strong verbal and written communication skills.
- Minimum 50 WPM typing speed.
- Proven ability to work independently, troubleshoot in real-time, and keep a team aligned under pressure.
- Hustler mentality is non-negotiable, we’re looking for someone hungry to lead, grow, solve, and deliver.

Schedule Options
- Can work on any US hours (CST).

Why AJG Transport?
At AJG, you are paid according to your value. If you're someone the team can depend on, we will treat you and reward you as such  that’s the AJG Guarantee. Our culture thrives on ownership, clarity, and execution. You’ll learn fast, grow fast, and be expected to lead by example.

Due to the high volume of applications, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
